attributes.action: Make it law for children wearing Heelys and other rollerskates or riding a bike in public to wear a helmet and safety gear
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A helmet can save your live need I say no more

Kids wear these heelys trainers with a wheel in the heel and never wear a helmet or safety gear even though it says in the box and paperwork always wear one this should be legal just like a motorcycle rider has to wear one

Also children wearing a bike should wear a helmet by law I always wear one everyone should

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
